scripts.generate: npx --yes openapi-typescript-codegen --input ../../openapi.yaml --output ./generated --client axios && node fix-auth-header.js && echo '✅ ts-clients/generated regenerated and fixed!'
scripts.generate:frontend: cd ../inventory-management-frontend && npx --yes openapi-typescript-codegen --input ../../openapi.yaml --output src/api --client axios && cd ../ts-clients && node fix-auth-header.js && echo '✅ Frontend clients regenerated and fixed!'
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate && npm run generate:frontend
